name: Perfect Jelly Fit 3D
description:
How to play 

Swipe up and down to change shape reach destination with jelly with Shifer

Jelly with Shifer is new jelly shape game free more than 10.000 levels real challenging shifter fit shape game
Are you able to reach a basic shape games 3d funs?

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played!
